snippet: Richard Blumenthal of Connecticut and Edward Markey of Massachusetts called on the Obama administration to force the recall of every Takata airbag using a propellant that contains ammonium nitrate.
abstract: Sens Richard Blumenthal and Edward Markey call on Obama administration to force recall of all Takata airbags that use defective propellant; letter comes after death of Joel Knight, who was killed after colliding with stray cow in South Carolina in December 2015.
lead_paragraph: Richard Blumenthal of Connecticut and Edward Markey of Massachusetts called on the Obama administration to force the recall of every Takata airbag using a propellant that contains ammonium nitrate.

headline.main: Senators Call for a Much Broader Recall of Defective Takata Airbags After a Recent Death
headline.print_headline: Senators Demand Much Broader Recall of Defective Takata Airbags After a Recent Death
